current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Authorizing the reporting of committee
		  funding resolutions for the period March 1, 2013 through September 30,
		  2013.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted the following
			 resolution; which was considered and agreed to

text.#text:
That notwithstanding paragraph 9 of
			 rule XXVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to
			 defray its expenses, including the compensation of members of its staff, for
			 the period March 1, 2013 through September 30, 2013; and

text.#text:
not later than
			 February 26, 2013, each committee shall report 1 resolution authorizing the
			 committee to make expenditures out of the contingent fund of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may report 1 authorization resolution containing more
			 than 1 committee authorization resolution for the period March 1, 2013 through
			 September 30, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 58 ATS: Authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period March 1, 2013 through September 30, 2013.
